item.title: My Kolkata in Kolkata 2.0
item.dc:creator: Sukanta Pal
item.description: My Kolkata in Kolkata 2.0 Theme : Leisure TimeCurated by:...
item.content:encoded: My Kolkata in Kolkata 2.0 Theme : Leisure TimeCurated by: yours trulyDates: 12th – 21st March 2021I often heard people from outside Kolkata complaining, life in Kolkata has a slow pace and people waste time in leisure. But when I look at the living culture of Kolkata, I see the Leisure here is positive, it makes people take pause, reflect and have conversations on Politics, Cricket, Gastronomy, Art, Cinema, history… something that people in other cities have forgotten to do in the rat race of daily life. In my opinion this leisure is the reason that all kind of Arts flourished in this city for decades and it is also the reason why Kolkata is said to be the Thinking Pad for Artists. With this in my mind we invited photographers and enthusiasts to capture Leisure in Kolkata through their lense especially with the backdrop of Pandamic, that added an extra layer to Leisure Time at hand of people. The result is a phenomenal exhibition that was inaugurated by people who are friends, change makers and wonderful persons. Swarup DuttaAyan Sen Thanks for the support to #ZooAuthorityofWestBengal, #aliporezoo who collaborated with #kccinkolkata Thanks a million to an Avid photographer and an amazing leader Vinod Yadav for his generosity.
